entry.summary: Does JetBrains have plans for a stand-alone Rust IDE?ï»¿ There are no such plans at the moment because we donâ€™t see additional value a separate Rust IDE would bring. It would require almost the same support as we already have for C/C++ in CLion, as well as C/C++ support owing to the widely-used language interop. From JetBrainsâ€™ standpoint, a potential Rust IDE equals CLion with the IntelliJ Rust plugin, so it doesnâ€™t make sense to invest resources in developing and supporting a separate product.
